name: head-smash
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user delivers a life-endangering head butt at full power. The user also takes terrible damage.
flavor_text.platinum: The user delivers a life-endangering head butt at full power. The user also takes terrible damage.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user delivers a life-endangering attack at full power. The user also takes terrible damage.
